title: Watch: Man Picks Up Black Fur Ball, Turns Out It Was Hundreds Of Spiders Chilling Together!
text:
There are scary insects, and then there are spiders. Just the thought of them awakens the Ron (from Harry Potter) in me, makes me want to tear out of my skin and run towards hell as long as it does not have spiders. So, you would understand why a video of a man picking up hundreds of spiders - wrongfully assuming the cluster to be a big fur ball - freaked the living daylights out of me.

The video, which is now going viral, shows a Texas man approaching a massive black fur ball that seemed to have gathered in the corner of a wall.

The fur ball seems fluffy until it is in his hands and it starts to disintegrate.





It becomes increasingly clear with every passing moment of horror, that what the man has in his hands is hundreds of spiders that are scurrying away from his hand. The man seems unperturbed and brings the spiders closer to the camera, to let whoever is seeing the video know that those are indeed spiders.

People obviously freaked out after looking at the horrifying clip. While some claimed they screamed after watching the video, some said it made their skin crawl.

Well, forget spider man, a spider king seems to be in town. This man is either really brave or a freak of nature. I am going to run off to take a bath because it feels those little spiders are crawling on my skin.
